section.name: Join In
section.p: You're interested in participating? No problem, here are some open tasks to be finished.

ul.li: There is a problem with cross domain scripting which means that an AJAX call from your website to dmrl.de will not succeed.
I'd like to have a concept (including a protoype implementation) for a DMRL client which does not need to have Java-Scipt enabled on the browser.
Translation of the user documentation to (at least) german language.
Clean up the maven pom files.
Finish an initial version of the server module.
There is a problem with the deployment of the taglib to the application server which needs to be solved.
Implement a basic mechanism for service versioning.
Design a logo for the project.

Do some merchanidsing and create some advertised products including
T-Shirt,
Coffee mug,
Minigolf case and
Minigolf ball.
